<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ec792290eb902e01c9edfc0cb71e5235833df56a|patch 8.2.2143: Vim9: dead code in compiling :unlet>
patch 8.2.2143: Vim9: dead code in compiling :unlet

Problem:    Vim9: dead code in compiling :unlet.
Solution:   Don't check for "!" a second time.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2143: Vim9: dead code in compiling :unlet · vim/vim@ec79229
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2143: Vim9: dead code in compiling :unlet · vim/vim@ec79229
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: dead code in compiling :unlet. Solution: Don't check for "!" a second time.

patch 8.2.2142: memory leak when heredoc is not terminated

Problem:    Memory leak when heredoc is not terminated.
Solution:   Free heredoc_trimmed.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2142: memory leak when heredoc is not terminated · vim/vim@fffdf47
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2142: memory leak when heredoc is not terminated · vim/vim@fffdf47
attachments.text: Problem: Memory leak when heredoc is not terminated. Solution: Free heredoc_trimmed.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/8143a53c533bc7776c57e5db063d185bdd5750f3|patch 8.2.2141: a user command with try/catch may not catch an expres…>
patch 8.2.2141: a user command with try/catch may not catch an expression error

Problem:    A user command with try/catch may not catch an expression error.
Solution:   When an expression fails check for following "|". (closes #7469)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2141: a user command with try/catch may not catch an expres… · vim/vim@8143a53
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2141: a user command with try/catch may not catch an expres… · vim/vim@8143a53
attachments.text: …sion error Problem: A user command with try/catch may not catch an expression error. Solution: When an expression fails check for following "|". (closes #7469)

patch 8.2.2140: build failure with tiny features

Problem:    Build failure with tiny features.
Solution:   Add #ifdef.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/acbae18df528b6aee72ecfd66e344dc8be7b3775|patch 8.2.2139: Vim9: unreachable code in assignment>
patch 8.2.2139: Vim9: unreachable code in assignment

Problem:    Vim9: unreachable code in assignment.
Solution:   Don't check "new_local" when "has_index" is set.  Add test for
            wrong type of list index.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2139: Vim9: unreachable code in assignment · vim/vim@acbae18
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2139: Vim9: unreachable code in assignment · vim/vim@acbae18
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: unreachable code in assignment. Solution: Don't check "new_local" when "has_index" is set. Add test for wrong type of list index.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b5b9480ee936ef4cd0e350c468ef8c5f42fa398b|patch 8.2.2138: Vim9: "exit_cb" causes Vim to exit>
patch 8.2.2138: Vim9: "exit_cb" causes Vim to exit

Problem:    Vim9: "exit_cb" causes Vim to exit.
Solution:   Require white space after a command in Vim9 script. (closes #7467)
            Also fix that Vim9 style heredoc was not always recognized.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2138: Vim9: "exit_cb" causes Vim to exit · vim/vim@b5b9480
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2138: Vim9: "exit_cb" causes Vim to exit · vim/vim@b5b9480
